filmography.title: The Killers
filmography.role_description: A stoic ex-boxer who strangely refuses to run when two hitmen come to kill him, sparking an investigation into his past.
filmography.plot: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and an insurance investigator unravels the man's past betrayal by a beautiful woman.

filmography.title: Brute Force
filmography.role_description: A tough, brooding inmate who organizes a prison break to escape the tyranny of a sadistic guard captain.
filmography.plot: At a tough penitentiary, a prisoner plans a desperate escape to get away from a sadistic head guard.

filmography.title: Sorry, Wrong Number
filmography.role_description: The weak-willed husband of a wealthy invalid who becomes entangled in a murder plot to solve his financial troubles.
filmography.plot: While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A tough but fair Army sergeant who falls into a passionate, illicit affair with his captain's neglected wife in Hawaii before the Pearl Harbor attack.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

filmography.title: Vera Cruz
filmography.role_description: A charming but amoral American mercenary in Mexico who teams up with an ex-Confederate soldier to escort a countess and a cache of gold.
filmography.plot: During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an unsavory group of American adventurers are hired to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.

filmography.title: The Rose Tattoo
filmography.role_description: A boisterous, simple-minded truck driver who tries to woo a grieving Sicilian widow by emulating her late husband.
filmography.plot: A warm-hearted truck driver courts a widow who is obsessed with the memory of her late husband.

filmography.title: Trapeze
filmography.role_description: A crippled former aerialist who reluctantly agrees to teach a young, ambitious acrobat the dangerous triple somersault.
filmography.plot: A crippled circus acrobat is torn between teaching a younger man the triple somersault and his love for the same woman.
filmography.awards: Berlin Int'l Film Festival: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Rainmaker
filmography.role_description: A charismatic, smooth-talking con man and dreamer who brings hope and promises of rain to a drought-stricken town, charming a lonely spinster in the process.
filmography.plot: A con man arrives in a drought-ridden town, bringing hope and romance to a spinster.

filmography.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
filmography.role_description: The legendary lawman who forms an unlikely alliance with gambler Doc Holliday to defend his family against the Clanton gang.
filmography.plot: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

filmography.title: Sweet Smell of Success
filmography.role_description: A powerful, icy, and manipulative Broadway columnist who uses his influence to destroy his sister's relationship with a jazz musician.
filmography.plot: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces a press agent into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

filmography.title: Separate Tables
filmography.role_description: A volatile, alcoholic American writer living in a British seaside hotel who shares a tumultuous past with his ex-wife.
filmography.plot: Several lonely people at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth, England find their lives intersecting.

filmography.title: Elmer Gantry
filmography.role_description: A charismatic, fast-talking con man who discovers he can make a fortune as a fire-and-brimstone evangelist preacher.
filmography.plot: A fast-talking traveling salesman joins a female evangelist's road show and becomes a powerful religious figure, but his past secrets threaten his success.

filmography.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
filmography.role_description: A respected German judge and legal scholar who remains silent during his war crimes trial until he finally delivers a powerful confession of guilt.
filmography.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

filmography.title: Birdman of Alcatraz
filmography.role_description: A convicted murderer serving a life sentence in solitary confinement who becomes a world-renowned authority on birds.
filmography.plot: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actor

filmography.title: The Leopard
filmography.role_description: An aging Sicilian nobleman who watches with melancholy dignity as his aristocratic way of life fades away during the Risorgimento.
filmography.plot: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Palme d'Or (Film)

filmography.title: Seven Days in May
filmography.role_description: A charismatic, patriotic, but dangerous Air Force General who plots a military coup against the President of the United States.
filmography.plot: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

filmography.title: The Train
filmography.role_description: A French railway area inspector and Resistance cell leader who risks everything to stop a Nazi colonel from looting France's art treasures.
filmography.plot: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

filmography.title: The Professionals
filmography.role_description: An explosives expert and mercenary hired as part of a team to rescue a wealthy rancher's wife from Mexican revolutionaries.
filmography.plot: An American oil tycoon hires four professionals to rescue his kidnapped wife from a Mexican bandit, but the mission is not what it seems.

filmography.title: The Swimmer
filmography.role_description: A delusional suburban man who decides to 'swim' home via his neighbors' pools, slowly facing the ruin of his own life.
filmography.plot: A man swims pool to pool across his affluent Connecticut neighborhood, with each stop revealing more about his broken life.

filmography.title: Atlantic City
filmography.role_description: An aging, small-time gangster living on past glories who finds a chance for redemption and romance with a young waitress.
filmography.plot: In a corrupt city, a small-time gangster and the estranged wife of a pot dealer find themselves entangled in a drug deal gone wrong.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; BAFTA: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Local Hero
filmography.role_description: An eccentric American oil billionaire and astronomy enthusiast who sends a subordinate to Scotland to buy a village for a refinery.
filmography.plot: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village for a refinery, but things don't go as expected.

filmography.title: Field of Dreams
filmography.role_description: A kindly old doctor who had played one inning of major league baseball in his youth and gets a magical chance to play again.
filmography.plot: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella hears a voice in his cornfield telling him, 'If you build it, he will come,' leading him to build a baseball diamond.
